author: Seth McLaughlin
title: Pennsylvania’s Conor Lamb hypes electability in first Senate campaign ad

sentence: On the Democratic side, Pennsylvania’s progressive lieutenant governor, John Fetterman, is locked in a race against Congressman Conor Lamb, a moderate representing the north-western suburbs of Pittsburgh.

title: Trump fans angered by his endorsement of Dr. Oz

sentence: Current Pennsylvania Lieutenant Governor John Fetterman, Congressman Conor Lamb, and State Representative Malcolm Kenyatta will debate in Harrisburg with Dr. Dave Sosar a political scientist who says this debate is crucial to all three candidates.
